name: PulpQuest
intro: Luamancers captured The Magic Orbs and turn world in chaos. Use your power to restore The Magic Orbs and read The Magic Scroll
author: SCTF

__blocks: You: Ouch, it hearts.. What happened? Where am I?..
The Golden Fish: Let me go and I'll grant you a wish
?: Stranger! We've been waiting for you!
?: Oh, my apologies. I'm an arch-wizard Hogwarth. Luamancers captured The Magic Orbs and turn our world in chaos. Help me, stranger. You're my only hope.
You: I was playing SCTF 2023 when suddenly something bang me behind... I'm looking for a flag to return home. Do you know here is it?..
Hogwarth: Oh, it cannot be a coincidence! You mean The Magic Scroll in The Hall of Galf, that is captured.
Hogwarth: It's dangerous to go alone! Take this sword. Go to The Dungeon of Falumar straight ahead. Find a magic crystal to teleport to The Hall of Galf and defeat Luamancers.
Hogwarth: You have defeated Luamancers! The peace is restored. Thank you, stranger! Now, use your power to restore The Magic Orbs and read The Magic Scroll and go home.
Hogwarth: Concentrate, stranger. I believe in you!
Hogwarth: Hm... maybe you are not The Reverse Skill Proven..
Hogwarth: You may clean my magic lab daily for rent and food. It is not much but it is honest work. Since you have been stuck here...

The Magic Scroll: Only The Reverse Skill Proven can read The Magic Scroll.
Restore The Magic Orbs
